Module Contents

.. py:class:: GraphGL(init_opts: pyecharts.types.Init = InitOpts(), render_opts: pyecharts.types.RenderInit = RenderOpts())

   Bases: :py:obj:`pyecharts.charts.chart.Chart3D`


   <<< GraphGL Relational graphs using WebGL to support the layout and
   drawing of large-scale network/relational data. >>>


   .. py:method:: add(series_name: str, nodes: pyecharts.types.Sequence[pyecharts.types.GraphGLNode], links: pyecharts.types.Sequence[pyecharts.types.GraphGLLink], *, layout: str = 'forceAtlas2', force_atlas2_opts: pyecharts.types.GraphGLForceAtlas2 = None, symbol: pyecharts.types.Optional[str] = 'circle', symbol_size: pyecharts.types.Numeric = 5, itemstyle_opts: pyecharts.types.ItemStyle = None, linestyle_opts: pyecharts.types.LineStyle = opts.LineStyleOpts(), z_level: pyecharts.types.Numeric = 10)
